thread.title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Trading Desks, China, Ellison

author: WSJ Staff
title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Trading Desks, China, Ellison
text:
Following wild price swings for markets in the first quarter, Wall Street’s trading desks are poised to report one of their best three-month periods in years, writes Telis Demos. While no one is expecting a new peak in trading like the ones that occurred in 2009 and shortly before the financial crisis, the trading desks […]
  WSJ City: US Lawmakers Ramp Up Talk of Tech Regulation, Why Tensions Are Knocking Russian Assets Next South Africa’s Market Is Mirroring China’s Stock Selloff
